alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 20 at 12:24AM PST until December 21 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM PST THIS MORNING UNTIL 1 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast wind gusts near 50 mph expected in the Kern County mountains. Southeast wind gusts near 35 mph expected in the south end of the San Joaquin Valley. * WHERE...Kern County mountains and south end of the San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...From 4 AM PST this morning until 1 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust can significantly reduce visibility. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Bakersfield; Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi
